text: Di ahina guu made dono lodo, tangada mai i di hagabuulinga soukohp, ne hana gi Elisha ga helekai, “Meenei, dogu lodo guu made! Dela hua e iloo e goe mee taane e hagalaamua Dimaadua, gei dolomeenei, dahi daane ne boibana ginai ana bahihadu, gu hanimoi belee lahi agu dama daane dogolua belee hai ana hege e hui di boibana dogu lodo.”
